featured.text: Given this powerful effect, parents who are trying to lose weight should be careful of how their dieting habits can influence a child’s perceptions about food and healthful eating.
The soybean is healthful and has become popular in the western world.

definition.zh_def: 有益健康的，促進健康的
definition.en_def: Conducive to good health; beneficial to one's health.
definition.example: Eating fruits and vegetables is healthful for your body.
